languages.text: {n}Стражам колонии пришлось испытать несколько методов сокрытия себя от глаз загадочного врага, но в итоге они преуспели.{/n}
{n}The colony's wardens experimented with several means of disguise but did eventually succeed in hiding themselves from the eyes of their mysterious foe.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Стражам колонии пришлось испытать несколько методов сокрытия себя от глаз загадочного врага, но в итоге они преуспели.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Armed with the xenotech and the protective talismans, the planetary troops have moved out to storm the pit. The soldiers could tame the slaves and the raging mechanisms with barely any losses. They even managed to wound the weakened creature, which disappeared in a flash of green light.{/n}

{n}Armed with the xenotech and the protective talismans, the planetary troops have moved out to storm the pit. The soldiers could tame the slaves and the raging mechanisms with barely any losses. They even managed to wound the weakened creature, which disappeared in a flash of green light.{/n}
{n}The colony's overseers experimented with several means of disguise but did eventually succeed in hiding themselves from the eyes of their mysterious foe.{/n}
{n}The colony's overseers experimented with several means of disguise but did eventually succeed in hiding themselves from the eyes of their mysterious foe.{/n}
{n}The colony's wardens experimented with several means of disguise but did eventually succeed in hiding themselves from the eyes of their mysterious foe.{/n}
{n}The colony's wardens experimented with several means of disguise but did eventually succeed in hiding themselves from the eyes of their mysterious foe.{/n}

languages.text: {n}殖民地的看守试验了几种不同的伪装方法，最终成功地躲过了神秘敌人的眼睛。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The colony's wardens experimented with several means of disguise but did eventually succeed in hiding themselves from the eyes of their mysterious foe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}殖民地的看守试验了几种不同的伪装方法，最终成功地躲过了神秘敌人的眼睛。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los alcaides de la colonia probaron distintos métodos de camuflaje, pero finalmente consiguieron ocultarse de la mirada de su misterioso enemigo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The colony's wardens experimented with several means of disguise but did eventually succeed in hiding themselves from the eyes of their mysterious foe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los alcaides de la colonia probaron distintos métodos de camuflaje, pero finalmente consiguieron ocultarse de la mirada de su misterioso enemigo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}コロニーの監督者たちはいくつかの偽装方法を試したが、最終的には謎の敵の目から身を隠すことに成功した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The colony's wardens experimented with several means of disguise but did eventually succeed in hiding themselves from the eyes of their mysterious foe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}コロニーの監督者たちはいくつかの偽装方法を試したが、最終的には謎の敵の目から身を隠すことに成功した。{/n}
{n}コロニーの監督者たちはいくつかの偽装方法を試したが、最終的には謎の敵の目から身を隠すことに成功した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les gardiens de la colonie essaient plusieurs sortes de camouflage et finissent par arriver à ne pas se faire repérer par leur mystérieux ennemi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The colony's wardens experimented with several means of disguise but did eventually succeed in hiding themselves from the eyes of their mysterious foe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les gardiens de la colonie essaient plusieurs sortes de camouflage et finissent par arriver à ne pas se faire repérer par leur mystérieux ennemi.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Wächter der Kolonie experimentierten mit verschiedenen Verkleidungen, und letztlich gelang es ihnen tatsächlich, sich vor den Augen ihres mysteriösen Feindes zu verstecken.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The colony's wardens experimented with several means of disguise but did eventually succeed in hiding themselves from the eyes of their mysterious foe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Wächter der Kolonie experimentierten mit verschiedenen Verkleidungen, und letztlich gelang es ihnen tatsächlich, sich vor den Augen ihres mysteriösen Feindes zu verstecken.{/n}
{n}Die Aufseher der Kolonie experimentierten mit verschiedenen Verkleidungen, und letztlich gelang es ihnen tatsächlich, sich vor den Augen ihres mysteriösen Feindes zu verstecken.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hapishane müdürleri, farklı türden saklanma yolları deneyerek nihayet esrarengiz düşmanın gözlerinden gizlenmeyi başardı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The colony's wardens experimented with several means of disguise but did eventually succeed in hiding themselves from the eyes of their mysterious foe.{/n}
